issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Please put this into the next release. Allows for prettier text aligning in Labels.

comments.body: Still nothing? Please add these simple things to TiMobile (preferably iOS). It should be very easy to implement.

Just came across [this|https://marketplace.appcelerator.com/apps/790#overview] paid module again, which is _insane_. Please make it free, so you can close this ticket and have some more satisfied users (read the reviews).
Still not available in the latest SDK on both iOS and Android. Can please someone check this?
To confirm, you are looking for justified text in labels, and on both iOS an Android?
Yes, please add option to justify label to next release. Thanks

I just needed this property for the new KitchenSink, so let's expose it! Unfortunately, justified text alignment is not available natively on the Android platform, so this is iOS-only for now.

PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8562
Unit-Test: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/pull/8

I re-ran the testcase with additional text in the label, and found that the fix does work correctly. If there are not enough words to wrap around to multiple lines, the alignment behaves like LEFT. This behavior is consistent with Native as well. Therefore, the fix is validated.
